recipesJson.name: Stairway to Heaven
recipesJson.author: Kelgar78
recipesJson.description: Smore! Yea more smore!!! I think i have told you how much i like this concentrate! Now i have mixed it with the best banana out there and as base biscuits. Leave it 7 days to steep and is ready for vaping. Good mixes!!!

reviews.text: An excellent smore profile. Whoever likes smore must mix this one. Gives the profile from day 3. Grats for this and ty for sharing!
